outputs.output_descr:
Output1: National capacities for HD and MDG data production and usage in policy making enhanced, including 
Output 2: Improved understanding of stakeholders (students, civil society, policy makers) of HD and MDGs
Output 3: Supported and strengthened CoP of practitioners working in the area of HD and MDG
Output 4: Jointly elaborated and disseminated HD and MDG related knowledge products within the CoP
Output 5: Improvement of understanding the HD consequences of the financial crisis
Output 6: Increased expert capacities of UNDP in human development through expert exchange scheme
Output 7: Capacity of BRC strengthened for provision of quality services on HD for the country offices
Output 8: Capacity of BRC strengthened in the area of economic vulnerability in our region
Output 9: Increase of capacities to address Roma exclusion in a complex manner
Output 10: Supported MDGs and post-2015 regional consultations and research

project_descr: Improving Human Development Literacy and Strengthening Capacities for Implementation of MDGs in Central, Eastern Europe and the CIS
